name: Aspect (itch) (Gordon Midwood)
description:
Introduction: 

Aspect is a 2.5D puzzle platformer about a girl who has lost her way. She finds herself far from home in a labyrinth without any recollection of how she became lost in the first place. When she awakes she hears a voice that is unfamiliar to her, she learns that this is her shadow aspect. The shadow aspect and herself must work together to find a way home. 

Controls: 

'A' to move left 

'D' to move right

 'Space' to jump

 'E' to pick up objects

 'Q' to interact

 'Left Control' to swap focus between light and shadow
